trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Gonzales
There were 2 other sightings in Gonzales on or around August 3rd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 9 pm I went outside to get the animals food and bring it in for the night. I was at the picnic table which is at the northern end of our patio and looked towards the tower. Above said tower, I saw a series of bright lights (5) that looked out of place. I was thinking it was an AirMED helo, or an Army helo, but no sound, not even crickets. It started to move towards the west (GONZALES) and that is when I notice two more behind it. the other two stopped above the tower for a few minutes and then they started to fly towards the west.
Summary: Black Triangle object seen above Laurel Ridge Radio Tower
